basic.description: Recent advances in understanding neurotransmission and pharmacology in the central nervous system will be discussed. The current literature describing progress in understanding molecular, cellular and behavioural aspects of brain function, and the impact of drugs and disease, will be examined. Winter; seminars and tutorials. Given in years ending with an uneven number. J. Reynolds PREREQUISITE:  Permission of the Graduate Program required. Restricted enrollment.  EXCLUSION: PHAR-810*
basic.subject: BMED
basic.title: Advances in Neuropharmacology
